title: Signaling MIB for PacketCable and IPCablecom Multimedia Terminal Adapters (MTAs)
abstract:
This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB)
for use with network management protocols in the Internet community.
In particular, it defines a basic set of managed objects for Simple
Network Management Protocol (SNMP)-based management of PacketCable-
and IPCablecom-compliant Multimedia Terminal Adapter devices.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
